item.title: #TIL : Setter and getter behavior of class property in Python3
item.description: Setter and getter behavior of class property in Python3 In previous TIL, I learned about the way to define getter and setter in Javascript Today, I learned it in Pythonic way ;) (in Python3) So here is example (the easy way to learn from a code) : class A: def __init__(self,x): print ('init', x) self.x = x @property def x(self): print ('getter') return self.__x @x.setter def x(self, x): print ('setter', x) if x < 0: self.
